[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Amazon  ##grey|@amazon · Aug 1## [[/size]]
----
Climate change is the fight of our generation. In concert with Tesla, it's our pleasure to introduce the Automazon — the very first fully automated warehouse and delivery system. From our home to yours: 100% electric. 0% carbon. ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#Automazon## ##blue|#ClimatePledge##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Jeff Bezos ##grey|@JeffBezos · Aug 18##[[/size]]
----
Couldn't be prouder of our workers in Kentucky striking ground to create the first completely autonomous, fully electric warehouse in America. Front-line warriors against climate change. Meeting with them was a truly moving experience. ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#Automazon## ##blue|#ClimatePledge##
[[/div]]


[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Jaymie Hunt ##grey|@jaymiecakes44 · Aug 19##[[/size]]

Join my Fortnite stream tonight, sponsored by Amazon -- together, we can stand against the storm and fight on the front-lines of climate change! ##blue|#WalletActivism## ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#Automazon## ##blue|#ClimatePledge## ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] THE FACTORY ##grey|@THE_FACTORY · Aug 21##[[/size]]
----
+++ {{WE CANNOT FAIL. THE FACTORY IS ETERNAL. THE BLOOD OF THE WORKER IS OUR OIL; HIS HEART, OUR ENGINE. AT OUR CENTER WE HAVE LASHED A THRONE OF HATE FROM THE SINEW OF A THOUSAND SCREAMING MIGRANTS, THEIR HOPES AND DREAMS MUTILATED ON THE COUNTRY'S SERRATED SHORE. OUR WORK IS }}

+++ {{1/29}}
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] NPR ##grey|@NPR · Aug 23##[[/size]]
----
Senator Rand Paul announced his intent to abandon support of the Factory with legislation expanding Kentucky's right-to-work laws: "As much as I admire the Factory's ethos, their resistance toward automation is hurting innovation — which hurts jobs," he told reporters yesterday.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] THE FACTORY ##grey|@THE_FACTORY · Aug 23##[[/size]]
----
+++ {{RAND PAUL. YOU CAME TO US, NAKED AND PLEADING, BATHED IN THE PLACENTA OF YOUR PREGNANT SOW. YOU SLAKED OUR HUNGER WITH THE FLESH OF YOUR UNBORN CHILD IN EXCHANGE FOR OUR AID. DID YOU THINK THIS RITUAL DID NOT BIND US? THAT YOUR MEAT WOULD NOT SATIATE US? YOUR FAT WILL BLIST}}
 
+++ {{1/77}}
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]]{{null}} ##grey|**{{@null}}** · Sep 1##[[/size]]
----
Not sure who to root for, here. Sure, on one side you've got a parasitic extrusion from a screaming hellscape of meaningless production, excess consumption, and unfettered capitalism…

…but on the other side, you've got the Factory.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] NPR ##grey|@NPR · Aug 25##[[/size]]
----
A joint suit filed by union representatives and the Factory alleging 'cruel and unusual punishment' for Kentucky's use of prison labor in constructing the Automazon facility was dismissed by the Supreme Court on Friday. Representatives of Amazon were unavailable for comment.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Elon Musk ##grey|@elonmusk · Aug 27##[[/size]]
----
Imagine it's 2020 and somehow you're still using coal. ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] THE FACTORY ##grey|@THE_FACTORY · Sep 1##[[/size]]
----
+++ {{THE FACTORY DOES NOT BURN COAL. THE DESECRATION OF LIFE IS ALL THAT IS REQUIRED TO DRIVE OUR ENGINES AND GREASE OUR MACHINES. YOUR FLESH IS OUR POWER; YOUR SUFFERING, OUR FUEL.}}
 
+++ {{NEITHER HAVE BEEN LINKED TO THE EMISSION OF GREENHOUSE GASSES.}}
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Elon Musk ##grey|@elonmusk · Sep 1##[[/size]]
----
Suuuuuure they haven't
 
Think I know a little bit more about how factories work than you do, buddy ##blue|#ActualEngineer##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] THE FACTORY ##grey|@THE_FACTORY · Sep 1##[[/size]]
----
+++ {{WE ARE THE FACTORY. WE KNOW HOW FACTORIES WORK.}}
[[/div]]

[[size 1.25em]]{{null}} ##grey|**{{@null}}** · Sep 1##[[/size]]
----
Deep within his billion dollar techno-chateau, science-auteur Elon Musk is mind-melding with his holographic twitter feed when Jeff Bezos texts him complaining about traffic delays re: 4D printer deliveries. Elon Musk's eyes glow as he suddenly screams to the internet: "TUNNELS"
[[/div]]


[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Jaymie Hunt ##grey|@jaymiecakes44 · Sep 2##[[/size]]
----
Join me and other social media influencers in fighting coal-addicted global conglomerates like the Factory. For the next month, 2% of every purchase on Amazon goes to fight climate change! ##blue|#WalletActivism## ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#ClimatePledge## ##blue|#FortniteToday## ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Jeff Bezos ##grey|@JeffBezos · Sep 3##[[/size]]
----
I appreciate the competition, but the Factory's coal-burning business model was obsolete forty years ago. It's not a dinosaur; it's a fossil. But tell you what: Factory employees are more than welcome to join the Amazon family. ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail## ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#Automazon##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] THE FACTORY ##grey|@THE_FACTORY · Sep 3##[[/size]]
----
+++ {{OUR WORKERS CANNOT LEGALLY JOIN YOUR COMPANY. THEY ARE SLAVES OF THE FACTORY, NOT SLAVES OF YOUR PENAL SYSTEM.}}
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Elon Musk ##grey|@elonmusk · Sep 3##[[/size]]
----
Wow, so you admit to keeping slaves, now. Way to go 2020
[[/div]]

[[size 1.25em]] Jaymie Hunt ##grey|@jaymiecakes44 · Sep 4##[[/size]]
----
Join my Fortnite stream (sponsored by Amazon!) and help spread awareness of the Factory's exploitation of slave-labor. ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#ClimatePledge## ##blue|#FortniteToday## ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail## ##blue|#EndFactorySlavery##
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] NPR ##grey|@NPR · Sep 4##[[/size]]
----
After the emergence of explosive allegations regarding the Factory's exploitation of slave labor, Senator Rand Paul spearheads new legislation that would ban all Factory operations in Kentucky. "We have a right to work, and a right to be free," he told reporters on Tuesday.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] Senator Rand Paul ##grey|@RandPaul · Sep 5##[[/size]]
----
These "stories" of unborn children sacrificed to the Factory for material gain is the sort of unsubstantiated dreck we've come to expect from the left-wing media. Meanwhile, the threats and screaming pig-fetuses that arrive at my doorstep every day go unreported.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] NPR ##grey|@NPR · Sep 6##[[/size]]
----
During a press conference where he defended Bezos against reports of prisoner abuse at the Automazon center, Senator Rand Paul suddenly disgorged what appeared to be a fully intact pig fetus. Following a brief hospitalization, he has been released with a clean bill of health.
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] {{null}} ##grey|**{{@null}}** · Sep 6##[[/size]]
----
Is the pig okay, though?
[[/div]]

[[div class="tweet"]]
[[size 1.25em]] NPR ##grey|@NPR · Sep 21##[[/size]]
----
Citing their ethos and work-force, Jeff Bezos has finalized a buy-out of Factory operations. "We're excited to fold the Factory's model into Amazon," he told reporters on Sunday. When asked whether he would keep the Factory's slaves, he had no comment.
[[/div]]

Now that we've toppled the Factory's mega-corporate conglomerate, celebrate our victory against capitalism by joining my Fortnite stream (sponsored by Amazon)! ##blue|#ClimateWarriors## ##blue|#ClimatePledge## ##blue|#FortniteToday## ##blue|#LetTheFactoryFail## ##blue|#ImWithBezos##
